title: New: Young Montana? – Twenty’93
body:
Photo by [Lily Pollack](http://lilypollack.com/)

It’s been a while since we were first acquainted with the delights of **[Young Montana?](http://youngmontana.com/)** Since the release of his debut LP, _Limerence_, last May, the world of the young producer has became an increasingly quiet one.

This morning **Montana?** must have heard our cries, dropping a new cut onto his [Soundcloud](http://soundcloud.com/young-montana) for our collective listening pleasures. Pulsating, fidgety and other worldly, the new piece of music has a dramatic and spaced feel to it, almost resembling some of the work of **Fuck Buttons**, which of course is no bad thing.

Stream the new track below.
